meanings.definition: The quality or state of being blue in color.
meanings.sent1: The bluenesses of the sky on a clear day are truly breathtaking.
meanings.sent2: She painted her room in various bluenesses to create a calming atmosphere.
meanings.sent3: The bluenesses of the ocean seemed to match the sadness in his eyes.
meanings.sent4: The bluenesses of the mountains in the distance gave the illusion of being within reach.
meanings.sent5: The bluenesses of the flowers in the garden stood out against the green leaves.

meanings.definition: The feeling or expression of sadness or melancholy.
meanings.sent1: Her bluenesses were evident in the way she spoke softly and avoided eye contact.
meanings.sent2: The bluenesses in his voice hinted at the pain he was trying to hide.
meanings.sent3: Despite her bluenesses, she always managed to bring a smile to others' faces.
meanings.sent4: The bluenesses of the rainy day matched his somber mood perfectly.
meanings.sent5: His bluenesses lifted when he received a surprise visit from an old friend.
